fillAllFieldsWarning: Please fill in all required fields.
confirmDeleteProductBody: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this product?
confirmDeleteQuoteBody: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this quote?
confirmBookingBody: According to accounting laws, this is a final action that cannot be deleted, only corrected.
errorTryAgain: An error occurred. Please try again.
inviteLinkCreatedBody: Send the following link to the person you want to invite. The link can only be used once.
teamMembersDescription: People with access to the company
inviteNewMemberDescription: Create a unique one-time link to send to the person you want to invite.
noTeamMembers: You haven't invited any team members yet.
heroSubtitle: From the first quote to the paid invoice and automatic bookkeeping. FlowBooks is the AI platform that gathers all your finances, so you can focus on what you do best.
mailSettingsFailed: Could not connect. Please check your credentials.
dangerZoneDescription: This action is irreversible. All associated data (invoices, products, etc.) will be permanently deleted.
manageExpenseCategories: Manage the categories used to classify your expenses.
defaultInvoiceTextDescription: This text (e.g., payment terms) is automatically added to all new invoices.
invoiceReminderSettingsDescription: Enable and set up automatic email reminders for unpaid invoices. Requires functional email settings.
emailClientSettingsDescription: Connect your company's email account to send and receive emails directly from FlowBooks.
overviewSettingsDescription: Choose which widgets to display on your overview page.
deleteAccountDescription: Your user will be permanently deleted. Company data will not be affected.
defaultInvoiceTextSaved: Default invoice text has been saved!
noCategoriesAdded: No categories have been added yet.
enterNewCategoryName: Enter new name for the category:
confirmDeleteCategory: Are you sure? This cannot be undone.
invalidImageLink: Please provide a direct link to an image (jpg, png, etc.).
couldNotDeleteAccount: Could not delete the account. Please log out and log in again.
confirmDeleteAccount: Are you absolutely sure? Type 'DELETE' to confirm.
confirmDeleteCompany: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete "{companyName}"? This cannot be undone. Type the company name to confirm.
featuresTitle: Everything you need. Nothing you don't.
featuresSubtitle: We've built the tools that actually solve your problems, without unnecessary complexity.
featureBankConnectionDescription: Securely sync with your bank via Tink. FlowBooks automatically fetches your transactions, matches payments to invoices, and simplifies reconciliation.
featureReceiptScanningDescription: Snap a photo of a receipt and let our AI interpret the date, amount, vendor, and suggest an accounting category. Save time and avoid manual errors.
featureCrmDescription: Send beautiful quotes and follow deals from start to finish. All customer history, from first contact to paid invoice, is gathered in one place.
featureInvoicingDescription: Create and send professional invoices in under a minute. The system keeps track of which are unpaid, paid, and overdue.
featureInventoryDescription: Keep track of your products, purchase prices, and stock levels. Get a forecast of your inventory's potential sales value.
featureTaxDescription: Automatically generate documentation for your VAT reports and get a clear overview of your profits. Less stress when it's time to file.
ctaSubtitle: Create an account and discover how smooth it can be. It's free to get started.
footerText: © 2025 FlowBooks. Built for entrepreneurs, by entrepreneurs.
twoFactorAuthenticationDescription: Protect your account from unauthorized access by requiring a second verification method upon login.
correctionNotice: You are creating a correction entry. The original entry will be marked as corrected and a reversal entry will be created.
referralIdPlaceholder: Enter the ID provided to you
companyNameIsRequired: Please enter a name for the new company.
projectsDescription: Create projects to track the profitability of specific assignments. Click on a project to see details.
noProjectsYet: You haven't created any projects yet.
noTransactionsForProject: No transactions linked to this project.
noUnbilledTime: There is no unbilled time for this project.
createInvoiceFromTimeNotice: This will create a draft invoice with {lineCount} time entries. You can adjust the hourly rate and details before posting.
deleteProjectWarning: Are you sure? This cannot be undone. Transactions linked to the project will not be deleted.
quoteLocked: The quote is locked and cannot be edited.
quoteSentAndLocked: The quote has been saved and locked!
convertConfirmBody: A new invoice will be created based on this quote. The quote will be marked as 'Accepted'. Are you sure?
quoteAcceptedInvoiceDetails: The quote has been accepted. Please fill in the invoice details.
uploadInvoiceNotice: Upload a PDF or image of a supplier invoice to let the AI interpret it automatically.
invoiceAnalysisNotice: This may take a moment, especially for PDF files.
invoicePostedAndLocked: The invoice has been posted and locked!
sendConfirmationBody: Are you sure you want to send invoice #{invoiceNumber} to {email}?
emailMissingNotice: Please enter an email address for the customer "{customerName}" to send the invoice.
syncInventoryNotice: This will adjust the stock levels for all products on this invoice. Are you sure?
noProductsToSync: No products on the invoice to synchronize.
billProcessorNotice: The AI has interpreted your PDF. Please verify the information below and link products before posting.
confirmBillNotice: This will create an expense and an unpaid bill in the system. Are you sure?
invoicePosted: The supplier invoice has been posted!
vatReportInfo: A simplified summary for the entire period. Always consult with an accountant.
profitReportInfo: A basis based on your transactions. Depreciation and accruals are not included.
enterNewCategoryName: Enter new name for the category:
confirmDeleteCategory: Are you sure? This cannot be undone.
timeTrackingDescription: Register worked hours here. You can then create invoices based on unbilled time from the customer or project view.
noTimeEntriesYet: You haven't registered any time entries yet.
timeEntrySaved: The time entry has been saved!
timeEntryUpdated: The time entry has been updated!
couldNotSaveTimeEntry: Could not save the time entry.
timeEntryDeleted: The time entry has been deleted!
couldNotDeleteTimeEntry: Could not delete the time entry.
deleteTimeEntryConfirmBody: Are you sure? This cannot be undone.
templatesDescription: Create reusable templates for frequently occurring transactions, such as payroll or sales reports from an e-commerce platform.
noTemplatesYet: You haven't created any templates yet.
templateLinesDescription: Build your template with one or more lines. You can use percentages (%) to distribute a total amount.
templateNameAndLinesRequired: Template name and at least one line are required.
deleteTemplateConfirmBody: Are you sure? This cannot be undone.
contactsDescription: Manage your customers and suppliers. Click on a contact to see detailed history.
noContactsYet: You haven't added any contacts yet.
deleteContactBody: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this contact?
noProductsEmptyStateDescription: Add your first product via the "New Product" button in the top right or via "Import Data" in the menu.
deleteProductsConfirmBody: Are you sure you want to permanently delete {count} products?
inventoryProjectionDescription: Set a percentage distribution to see how it affects the potential revenue from your inventory. The setting is saved and displayed on the Overview page.
deleteProductConfirmBody: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this product?
recurringTransactionsDescription: Scheduled income and expenses that are automatically created at midnight on their due date. You can also run them manually here.
fillAllFieldsCorrectly: Please fill in all fields correctly.
noHistoryYet: No transactions have been generated from this item yet.
tinkManualBookNotice: Please fill in date, description, and a valid amount.
tinkMatchSuccess: Invoice #{invoiceNumber} has been matched and marked as paid!
tinkAISuggestionConfirmBody: Are you sure you want to post this transaction in the category "{categoryName}"?
mailSettingsNotConfigured: Could not load emails. Have you configured your account?
mailAIAssistantPlaceholder: AI Assistant: Write a reminder for invoice #123...
mailCouldNotSend: Could not send email. Please check your settings and try again.
mailAIPromptRequired: Please provide an instruction to the AI assistant.
scanQrCodeInstruction: 1. Scan the QR code with your authenticator app (e.g., Google Authenticator).
enterCodeInstruction: 2. Enter the 6-digit code from the app to verify and complete the setup.
disableTwoFactorBody: Are you sure you want to remove the extra protection for your account?
noPurchaseOrdersYet: You have no purchase orders yet.
poSupplierAndLinesRequired: Supplier and at least one product line are required.
poCreated: The purchase order has been created!
couldNotSavePo: Could not save the purchase order.
poReceivedSuccess: Delivery received, stock and expenses have been updated!
poReceivedError: An error occurred while receiving the delivery.
receiveDeliveryConfirm: This will increase the stock for all products on the order and create a corresponding expense. Are you sure?
noProductsFoundForSupplier: No products found for this supplier.
scanReceiptDescription: Upload an image of your receipt. Our AI will try to interpret the content automatically. We recommend images in JPG, PNG, or WEBP format.
reviewAISuggestionNotice: The AI has interpreted the receipt. Please verify and adjust the information below before saving.
invalidReceiptAmount: Please enter a date, party, and a valid amount.
couldNotSaveReceipt: Could not save the expense from the receipt.
deleteQuoteBody: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this quote?
importDescription: Upload a CSV file from your supplier. In the next step, you will map the file's columns to FlowBooks' product fields.
fileSeemsEmptyOrIncorrect: The file seems to be empty or incorrect. It must contain at least one header row and one data row.
mapColumnsDescription: Select which column from your file corresponds to the fields in FlowBooks. Fields you don't map, the AI will try to fill in.
useAi: Do not use / Let AI decide
mapNameToProduct: You must map a field to 'Product Name'.
noProductsWithNameFound: No products with names could be found based on your mapping.
reviewAiSuggestionsDescription: The AI has filled in product data based on your mapping. You can edit all fields below before importing.
importError: An error occurred during the import.
confirmPostingBody: The invoice will be locked for editing and marked as sent. This is an accounting event that cannot be undone.
confirmSaveDraftBody: Are you sure you want to save this draft?
invoiceEmailBodyAttachment: It is attached to this email.
invoiceEmailBodyIgnore: Please disregard this message if payment has already been made.
lowStockProductsCount: You have {count} products with low stock.
verifyEmailNotice: Please verify your email before logging in. Click the link to send a new email.
verificationEmailSent: A verification email has been sent to {email}. Please click the link in the email and then log in.
unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
enterEmailForPasswordReset: Please enter your email address in the field above first.
passwordResetEmailSent: A password reset link has been sent to {email}.
couldNotSendPasswordReset: Could not send password reset link. Please check that the email address is correct.
welcomeInvite: Welcome! You have been invited to {companyName}. Please fill in the rest of your details.
invalidInvite: The invitation link is invalid or has already been used.
emailInUse: The email address is already in use. Please log in.
weakPassword: The password is too weak. It must be at least 6 characters.
registrationError: Could not register. Please check that all fields are correct.
